sentences.en: All the girls fell over backwards to get the party ready.
sentences.cn: 姑娘们迫不及待地为聚会做准备.

sentences.en: Draw the floss backwards and forwards between the teeth.
sentences.cn: 将牙线在齿间来回拉动。

sentences.en: He just released his hold and toppled slowly backwards.
sentences.cn: 他刚一松开手就缓缓向后倒下。

sentences.en: He leans over backwards to make up for what he has lost.
he paced backwards and forwards nervously.
He works backwards, building a house from the top downwards.
sentences.cn: 他把工序倒过来了，从上往下建房子。

sentences.en: Keeping your back straight, swing one leg backwards.
sentences.cn: 挺直腰背，一条腿向后摆动。

sentences.en: People are bending over backwards to please customers.
sentences.cn: 人们正使出浑身解数取悦顾客。

sentences.en: She pushed me and I fell backwards into the chair.
sentences.cn: 她推了我一下，我便往后倒在椅子上。

sentences.en: The diver flipped over backwards into the water.
The third wave was so strong it knocked me backwards.
sentences.cn: 第3波浪太大了，把我打了回去。

sentences.en: Toby took a step backwards and knocked the video camera for six.
sentences.cn: 托比后退了一步,将摄像机撞翻在地.

sentences.en: we have bent over backwards to ensure a fair trial for the defendants.
sentences.cn: 我们竭尽全力保证对被告公平审判。

words.tran_cn: 向后倾斜的；被扫向后面的
向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的

phrases.phrase: bend (或 fall 或 lean) over backwards
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)竭尽全力（尤指为实现公平或给予帮助）

trans.tran_cn: 向后的，相反的；落后的；迟钝的

trans.tran_en: in the direction that is behind you
